akn:section.akn:heading: Gratuity payment to persons discharged for fraudulent enlistment

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1048. Gratuity payment to persons discharged for fraudulent enlistment The Secretary concerned may pay a gratuity of not to exceed $25 to a person discharged for fraudulent enlistment. (Added Pub. L. 98–525, title XIV, § 1401(d)(1), Oct. 19, 1984, 98 Stat. 2616.)
